meta_title: How to Move from Reactive to Proactive Maintenance
meta_description: Transition from reactive to proactive maintenance by ranking asset criticality, optimizing PM schedules, and utilizing the P-F interval to detect failures early.
title: How to Move from Reactive to Proactive Maintenance: A Phased Framework
keyword: how to move from reactive to proactive maintenance

hero_image.alt: Hero image for How to Move from Reactive to Proactive Maintenance: A Phased Framework

image_prompt: A high-tech industrial maintenance dashboard in the foreground showing a green "Asset Health" gauge at 92%, with a blurred background of a clean, organized manufacturing floor. A maintenance manager in a hard hat and safety vest is holding a tablet that displays a vibration analysis graph, standing next to a large centrifugal pump that has small, unobtrusive wireless sensors attached to its bearing housings. The lighting is bright and professional, conveying a sense of control and modern efficiency.
